job_offer_intro:
^Hello Feiyang, this is Lucia from the Talent Acquisition team at T Commerce.

We've reviewed your application for the Customer Support & Operations role and would love to connect to learn more about you and your experience.

T-Commerce is a digital solutions company focused on building smart, user-centric platforms for businesses across Southeast Asia.

Would you be available for a short WhatsApp call today? Just about 10 minutes
^Player:message Can I ask more about the role first before the call?
job_offer_dialogue_1:
^Totally understand the concern. Yes, this is a legitimate role.

You applied via Linkedin, and I'm reaching out on behalf of T Commerce's HR team.

You can also check us out at:
www.t-commerce.com
job_offer_dialogue_2:
^The Customer Support & Operations Executive role is full-time and mostly remote.

You'll be handling basic customer enquiries, managing orders, and assisting with operational tasks on platforms like Shopee and Lazada.

Training will be provided, and we're a small but friendly team!
^Player:message Sounds good! I'm okay to take the call today.
job_offer_dialogue_3:
^hey feiyang... not sure if that was meant as a joke, but just to clarify, I'm a legit recruiter from T-Commerce Asia.

We reached out because you applied on LinkedIn, and we really liked your profile.

It's okay to double-check things but calling someone a scammer without confirming first isn't very respectful.

I'll withdraw your application for now. best of luck with your job search.
job_verification_dialogue_1: ^Player:message Just checked the site. Looks okay, let's proceed
^Player:message Found your site but can't find your name there. Are you really part of HR?
job_verification_dialogue_2:
^No worries at all! My email is listed on the Careers page, easy to miss sometimes.

I'm with the onboarding team under HR and totally understand the need to double check.

Let me know if you'd like me to loop in a colleague or resend a formal email for peace of mind!
^Player:message Appreciate the clarification. Could you send a formal intro email again?
